benchmark_details.name: PLANET: A Collection of Benchmarks for Evaluating LLMsâ€™ Planning Capabilities
benchmark_details.overview: This paper surveys and categorizes existing benchmarks for evaluating the planning capabilities of large language models (LLMs) in various tasks such as embodied environments, web navigation, scheduling, and more. It identifies common testbeds for algorithm development while highlighting gaps that require further attention in benchmark creation.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To provide a comprehensive overview of benchmarks available for evaluating LLMs' planning abilities and identify gaps in existing benchmarks to guide future development.

data.source: Survey of existing planning benchmarks; aggregation of information from various sources
